clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Chidamide as a Single-agent Treatment for Patients With Relapse or Refractory B-NHL
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Chidamide as a Single-agent Treatment for Patients With Relapse or Refractory B-cell Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma (NHL)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective phase II clinical trial to observe the efficacy and safety of Chidamide as a single-agent treatment in patients with relapsed or refractory B-cell Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma (NHL).

primary_outcome.time_frame: every 6 weeks until 2 years after last patient's enrollment

every 6 weeks until 2 years after last patient's enrollment

clinical_study.condition: Relapsed or Refractory B-cell Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma (NHL)

intervention.description: Chidamide 30mg orally BIW (d1, 4, 8, 11, 15, 18). Treatment cycles are repeated every 3 weeks.The maximum duration of treatment is 2 years.
